subject: Simsonn 6+R H-Pattern Shifter
description_text:
Hello,

I ended up purchasing your pattern 6+R H pattern shifter from amazon
~6months ago before realizing you had a full product suite/website. It has
been a blast to use, but when I upgraded to my new PC a few days ago all my
peripherals work except this shifter. The led buttons are dim and when
pressed don't glow bright blue like before. I can still see the white power
inside the device.

Im running a booster cable to the PC and have tried different usb slots,
another computer and direct USB hub power. It is recognized in my device
manager but on Asseta Corsa it can recognize all gears except 3rd and 5th
gear.

Is there any firmware updates for this device or troubleshooting I can try?
To me it seems like its not getting enough power but I have tried all I can
with no luck. I very much like this shifter so I am trying to find a
solution. A warranty was purchased through amazon but since the purchase I
had a falling out with them and have closed my account down due to shady
practices.

Thanks,

conversations.body_text: Hi Tyler W,  Could you please provide your order number? Additionally, please send us a photo of the product so that I can confirm the exact model and offer you the correct solution. If possible, you may also record a video and share it with us via Google Drive. Just make sure the access permission is set to “viewable.”

It was purchased through amazon. Here is a link for the shifter video as
requested. Thanks
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1PmOW5aL42Z7WzVpC2_DnFxyEMY-JFPIb/view?usp=sharing

On Wed, Dec 10, 2025 at 7:14 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Tyler W,  So you mean the device was working fine before the upgrade, and the issue only appeared afterward, correct?

Correct. Granted I had not used it in a few weeks, my last memory it was
working.

On Wed, Dec 10, 2025 at 8:37 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Tyler W,  You just need to download Freejoy and connect your device, and I can check whether the configuration has any issues.      https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hnHNudj0VhE6xr7ypu-KeEDuVrlVHVg9/view?usp=drive_link

downloaded, what are my next steps?

On Wed, Dec 10, 2025 at 8:42 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Tyler W,  Please open Freejoy and check if the device is connected. Then click Read Config from Device and go to the Button interface to test for any issues. You can take screenshots of the Pin Config and Button interface and send them to me for configuration review. If it’s a settings issue, we can provide the factory configuration to help you restore it.

Please see it says incompatible Firmware?

On Sat, Dec 13, 2025 at 9:18 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Tyler W,  You are not using the Freejoy version I provided. The link I gave is for version 1.7.0, while you are using 1.7.1, which is not compatible.

my apologies, please see attached

On Wed, Dec 17, 2025 at 4:44 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Tyler W,  If it still doesn’t work, you can install ToDesk, and I can assist you remotely to check and resolve the issue. No registration is required—just provide the connection ID and the temporary access code.

Hi,

I am following up on my previous message regarding the remote support
session via ToDesk.

Please let me know when you might be available to assist me with the
shifter configuration.

Best regards,

Tyler W
